summary: The initial Airdrop documentation set is functionally complete and covers all major developer touchpoints as specified in AGENTS.md. All core documents have been created, and the API reference covers the primary configuration and code entry points.

outstanding_todos.description: A Mermaid diagram illustrating the high-level architecture of the Airdrop system needs to be created.
The Quick Start section needs more detail on creating and populating the `config.json` file, potentially linking to a separate secrets management guide.
The `normalizeNotionPage` function is a simplified example. A more robust implementation should be provided to handle various Notion property types.
The per-file git commit history was not created due to persistent sandbox environment issues. All files will be committed at once.
